Identify Clusters for Single Cell Data

IdentifyClusters.Rd

This function will identify clusters for single cell reduced dimensions supplied or from and ArchRProject

IdentifyClusters(input, reducedDims = "IterativeLSI",
  name = "Clusters", sampleCells = NULL, seed = 1,
  method = "seurat", dimsToUse = NULL, knnAssign = 10,
  nOutlier = 20, verbose = TRUE, tstart = NULL, ...)

Arguments

input

ArchRProject or matrix for cluster identification
reducedDims

reducedDims of ArchRProject if provided
name

name of cluster column if input is ArchRProject
seed

seed
method

supported methods are Seurat and LouvainJaccard
dimsToUse

reduced dims to use
knnAssign

number of nearest neighbors for assignment of outliers and estimation
nOutlier

number of cells required for a cluster to be called if not then these will be considered an outlier
...

arguments to provide Seurat::FindClusters or ArchR:::.clustLouvain (knn = 50, jaccard = TRUE)

Contents

  • Arguments
